name: My Lord
description:
With an old kingdom meeting its end, a new legacy must be started from the ground up. With the help of your trusted advisor, manage an array of people that wish to work for you while listening to nice, calming music!

Read cover letters, ask personal Questions and see if they are worth your time, and your limited money, for there is an endless tidal wave of monsters that wish to bring your doom, as they did the old monarchy.

Hire people like,

-Knights, archers and more to defend your kingdom

-Miners to provide and scouts to help you prepare for upcoming waves

-Butchers and Merchants to help bring in more money

-& Many more!

Learn to manage your money and to tell if someone is over selling themselves, or are a much needed addition to your work force, be it Army, or Labor.

Hire well, and spend smart in...

MY LORD.

(Note: There is bug on the webgl that crash the game at the 8th  turn. Please download the windows or mac client for more graphics quality and no bug)

(If your Mac user and can't open the game application try using this command "sudo chmod -R 755" on the terminal and drag and drop the MyLord game application to your terminal)
